verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3205>children<s%>: and she had a <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, Behold <S%H3068>now<s%>, Jehovah hath restrained <S%H6113>me<s%> from <S%H3205>bearing<s%>; go <S%H935>in<s%>, I pray <S%H8198>thee<s%>, unto my handmaid; it <S%H194>may<s%> be that I shall obtain <S%H1129>children<s%> by <S%H87>her<s%>. And Abram <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, her <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to <S%H87>Abram<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>: and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, My <S%H2555>wrong<s%> be upon <S%H5414>thee<s%>: I gave my <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> into thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>; and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> judge between me and <S%H8199>thee<s%>.

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H8198>Behold<s%>, thy maid is in thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; <S%H6213>do<s%> to her that which is good in <S%H2896>thine<s%> <S%H8297>eyes<s%>. And Sarai dealt hardly <S%H6031>with<s%> <S%H1272>her<s%>, and she fled from her <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> found <S%H4672>her<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, by the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>, <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, <S%H335>whence<s%> camest <S%H935>thou<s%>? and whither <S%H3212>goest<s%> <S%H559>thou<s%>? And she said, I am <S%H1272>fleeing<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>.
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7725>her<s%>, Return to thy <S%H1404>mistress<s%>, and <S%H6031>submit<s%> thyself under her <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7235>her<s%>, I will greatly <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, that it shall not be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2009>her<s%>, Behold, thou art with <S%H2030>child<s%>, and shalt <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.

And he shall be as a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H120>ass<s%> among <S%H3027>men<s%>; his hand shall be against every <S%H3027>man<s%>, and every man's hand against <S%H7931>him<s%>; and he shall dwell over <S%H6440>against<s%> all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H410>her<s%>, Thou art a God that <S%H7210>seeth<s%>: for she <S%H559>said<s%>, Have I even <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%> that seeth <S%H7210>me<s%>?
Wherefore the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H883>Beer-lahai<s%>-roi; <S%H6946>behold<s%>, it is between Kadesh and <S%H1260>Bered<s%>.

And <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>, whom <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%>, <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>.
